milestones.title: Team Established
milestones.description: Red Bird Racing was founded in 2017 as an experimental project. It quickly evolved into the official student racing team of HKUST.

milestones.title: First Competition
milestones.description: In 2018, Red Bird Racing participated in its first Formula Student competition. This marked a significant step in our journey towards engineering excellence.

milestones.title: Major Achievements
milestones.description: By 2019, the team achieved several notable accolades in various competitions. Our commitment to innovation and teamwork began to shine through.

milestones.title: New Innovations
milestones.description: In 2020, Red Bird Racing introduced groundbreaking innovations in our vehicle design. Our advancements set new standards for performance and efficiency.
